name: OmniTrivia - Neon Edition
description: A high-energy, multiplayer-style trivia game powered by Gemini. Features real-time gameplay simulation, dynamic question generation, and the ability to import custom trivia rounds from CSV files or public Google Sheets. Designed for deployment at trivia.omniflexfitness.com.
notes: To use the Google Sheets import feature, the Google Sheets API must be enabled in your Google Cloud project.
